properties.address: Selhurst Park Stadium, Holmesdale Road, Crystal Palace, Surrey, SE25 6PU, United Kingdom
properties.description:
Crystal Palace FC *Warm Hub is open to local residents over 65. 

We will be offering a choice of hot meals and drinks, a selection of activities such as bingo, quizzes and board games, and talks from guest speakers ‚Äì all provided free of charge.

When: Every Tuesday from 10:00 - 14:00 (from Tuesday 6th December - Tuesday 28 February) 

We will be closed on Tuesday 27 December 2022. 

Location: Crystal Palace Football Club


Pre-booking is essential, and we encourage residents to book a place by emailing misha.eleanya@cpfc.co.uk or by calling 02039068715, detailing any access or dietary requirements.


*With full co-operation of Croydon Council, Crystal Palace Football Club, its principal partner Cinch, the Palace for Life Foundation are collaborating on a new ‚ÄúWarm Hub‚Äù initiative at Selhurst Park this winter, inviting local residents aged over 65 to Selhurst Park once a week to enjoy a free hot meal and drinks, as well as an opportunity to socialize with fellow residents and staff.
properties.title: Crystal Palace Football Club

Everyone welcome.

properties.address: St Paul's United Reformed Church, Corner Croham Road / Croham Park Avenue, South Croydon, CR2 7HF, United Kingdom
properties.description:
There's a warm space at St Paul's United Reformed Church on Thursdays

  • Hot drinks, games, crafts, opportunities to chat in the warm, plug in your laptop, work, or do homework. Family-suitable films available on some occasions.
  • For families, single people, working people, younger and older. children aged up to 14 with a parent/carer or 14-17.
  • Light hot supper is available from 5:30 pm.


When: Every Thursday 3:30 pm - 6:30 pm (20th October 2022 - 24th March 2023)

Where: St Paul's United Reformed Church, Croham Park Avenue, CR2 7HF


Please register your wish to come at either 07971068887 or secretary@stpaulsurc.org.uk by 12 noon on the Thursday as places have to be limited to 12 per session.

properties.description:
Join our Warm Wednesday 

  • We will be offering hot drinks, cakes and biscuits to any older person attending our Warm Wednesday
  • We will bring local organisations together to provide support around bills, loneliness, and signposting older people to the correct service
  • We will have fun, socialise, listen to music and build new and meaningful connections

Where: West Croydon Methodist Church, 93 London Road, Croydon CR0 2RF (Entrance between Tariq Halal Shop & Lidl in London Road)

  • Wednesday 16th November
  • Wednesday 30th November
  • Wednesday 21st December from 2.30 pm ‚Äì 4.30 pm Christmas edition
  • Wednesday 28th December from 2.30 pm ‚Äì 4.30 pm New Year‚Äôs eve edition

hours._text: Our Warm Wednesdays programme will operate every Wednesday (including over the Christmas period) until the end of February. From 09.000 hot drinks will be available. A choice of soups and a buttered roll will be on offer from 12.30-14.00. From 14.00 we will serve hot drinks and homemade cakes. From 15.00 the focus will be on providing an after-school club with spaces for homework, reading, playing and boardgames. At 17.00 we will serve a hot meal and dessert.
